resources.string: Oops! We cannot scan as there is no camera in your phone.
Error! Some essential files are missing. We are attempting to download but looks like your device is out of memory. Please free up some space and try again.
Error! Some essential files to enable scanning are missing. Please update your OS and try again.
Application needs to access your camera, kindly allow.
Application needs to access your camera, kindly allow.
Place a barcode in the center of viewfinder rectangle to scan it.
